headline.main: CHANGSHA BATTLE AT CRITICAL PHASE; 50,000 Japanese Engaged 'in Immediate Vicinity' of City, Chinese Defenders Report RIVER CROSSINGS SOUGHT Invaders Attacking in Inner Mongolia, But Are Shelled Northwest of Nanchang

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Friday, Jan. 2 (U.P.) -- The fate of Changsha hung in the balance today as Japanese aggressors and Chinese defenders grappled in sanguinary battle on the plain between the Laotao and Liuyang Rivers, the latter at one point only three miles from the North Hunan communications and supply center.
abstract: Chinese shell Jap forces, Wuning area
